definition: (of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)

sentences.english: Lunar olivine was created by great volcanoes called fire fountains, which sprayed superheated lava into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月之橄欖石產生於名爲“火噴泉”的巨型火山。

sentences.english: They both come complete with a matching streamlet , a pump , and fountain heads .
sentences.chinese: 他們都來完成同等額小溪，一個水泵，噴泉頭。

sentences.english: A music fountain has just been completed in the Culture Square.
sentences.chinese: 一座音樂噴泉剛剛在文化廣場建成。

sentences.english: Huangpu River permanent fountain depicts a group of moving stories of this period.
sentences.chinese: 黃浦江邊一組永久性噴泉再現了這段動人的佳話。

sentences.english: A great poem is a fountain forever overflowing with the waters of wisdom and delight (P.B.Shelley, British poet)
sentences.chinese: 偉大的詩篇即是永遠噴出智慧和歡欣之水的噴泉。

sentences.english: The central gallery that runs through the square from north to the south has fountain waterscape.
sentences.chinese: 貫穿廣場南北的中央長廊，建有噴泉水景大道。

sentences.english: Spotlights can illuminate sculpture and fountains.
sentences.chinese: 投光燈可以照亮雕塑和噴泉。

sentences.english: and in the grounds around gardens, bowers, fountains and shady nooks in profusion.
sentences.chinese: 花園，涼亭，噴泉圍繞的場地以及納涼處，應有盡有。

sentences.english: Kostya watched them drift from the door to the fountain.
sentences.chinese: 克斯特亞看着他們從門口蹭到噴泉那裏。
火山和間歇噴泉均能噴發。

sentences.english: We glitzed up the lobby with a couple of fountains and a bird cage.
sentences.chinese: 我們用一對噴泉和一個鳥籠裝飾大廳。

sentences.english: Nearby, a middle-aged woman sits on the stone rim of a fountain, weeping quietly.
sentences.chinese: 附近一箇中年婦女坐在噴泉的石沿上默默地哭泣。

sentences.english: Old Faithful Geyser erupts approximately every 91 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 老忠實間歇噴泉大約每91分鐘噴發一次。

sentences.english: There are thousands of hot springs and fountains.
sentences.chinese: 園內有數以千計的溫泉和噴泉。

sentences.english: This blog is a fountain of spiritual inspirations and every-day life lessons.
sentences.chinese: 這個博客就像是充滿精神靈感和日常生活課程的噴泉。

sentences.english: Beautiful water fountain, titled Charybdis, designed by William Pye.
sentences.chinese: 美麗的噴泉，名爲蟳，設計的威廉派。

definition: sense of movement (often in a static work of art)/dynamic/vivid/lifelike
promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
